DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The purpose study investigate possible effect green-plant thylakoid supplementation restrict diet intervention study overweight obese men . Methods : Overweight-obese men ( BMI 25 - 35 ) treat 30 E % restrict diet one month , follow one month stabilization . Then divide two treatment arm one month ; one thylakoid-enriched diet ( n=10 ) one control diet ( n=10 ) . Body measurement blood sample take throughout study .
DOC.brief_title: Improvement Metabolic Health After Thylakoid Supplementation
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty healthy , non-vegetarian , non-smoking Caucasian men include study . Inclusion criterion : men age 40 70 year BMI 25 35 . Exclusion criterion : Metabolic disturbance , bariatric surgery , recent diet , food allergy treatment antibiotic . The study protocol approve Ethical Committee Lund University , Sweden ( # 2006/361 ) . The trial consist three period : 1 ) diet-restriction period ( one month ) 2 ) stabilizing period ( one month ) 3 ) diet-restriction period supplementation thylakoids placebo ( one month ) . The two weight-losing period include strict diet recommendation -30 energy % ( E % ) , macronutrient composition : 55-65 E % carbohydrate , 10-15 E % protein 25-35 E % fat . Sixty minute low intensive exercise per day also require . During stabilize month participant instruct eat healthy diet able keep achieve weight-loss . Day 0 , 28 , 56 84 participant arrive 12-hour fast blood sample anthropometric measurement . The blood sample analyze plasma-glucose , insulin , HbA1c , inflammation marker , cholecystokinin , ghrelin , total cholesterol , LDL-cholesterol , HDL-cholesterol , triacylglycerol .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , overweight , nonvegetarian , nonsmoking Medication metabolic disturbance , previous bariatric surgery , diabetes , diet treat antibiotic last 3 month , foodallergies
